website_summaries.verdict: The best budget source of collagen for women looking for better health in their hair, skin, and nails.
pros: Large capsule of 120 tablets provides a long lasting source of collagen supplements
Tablet formula includes a good source of vitamin C without any artificial ingredients
cons: Sometimes affects joint health more than skin, hair, and other exterior tissue

customer_reviews.title: Everyday
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a couple of years now & I will NEVER be without them. Fast service, well within the expiration date. Anything to keep the skin healthy & wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great and effective, I love the price point and the quality is just as good as any more expensive brands
customer_reviews.author: tygeryvonne

customer_reviews.title: SValley Collagen 1000 mg type 1, 3  120 count
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything it should. I notice the difference when I neglect to take it. And compared to other more expensive and more highly rated collagen products, for me, this is a better product. My big issue with this is price, value for the money. Nearly twice the price of what you can purchase this for at WalMart....if in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of the product and it came very quickly and at a great price. Will keep ordering it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: I was reluctantly going to order a second bottle with the idea that at least it was great for my joints which also need support
customer_reviews.text: Trust me when I say, you have to be patient. I started noticing my skin was sooo smooth and silky just before I almost gave up. I was reluctantly going to order a second bottle with the idea that at least it was great for my joints which also need support. I take 2 caps a day and started about 6 weeks ago. I am not taking the whole 3 caps but 2 seems to be working. My face is super soft and I am not sure if it is firmer but I think it is a little bit. I will come back and update in another 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: BabyMama45

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my regimen for hair/skin/nails
customer_reviews.text: Again, I have Lupus and my hair/skin and nails suffer from it. Since taking this product my nails have grown rapidly and have increased in strength, my skin feels tighter and my hair is stronger and longer. The tablet itself is pretty big and I would rather a capsule or liquid gelcap. It doesn't have a bad taste and the results are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Collegen tabls
customer_reviews.text: I think this is helping to thicken my hair. It's important to take them on an empty stomach. I chew them up. They taste like a protein drink.
customer_reviews.author: catsnout

customer_reviews.title: More collagen to try
customer_reviews.text: This works, I think, as well as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Phantompoodle

customer_reviews.title: Collagen ok
customer_reviews.text: Hard to know if this product is better as have taken collagen for years.
customer_reviews.author: Wynona Merle King

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great difference!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is regrowing (better than Rogane for me) my arthritic knee and total knee replacement have benefited from it. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LGN

product_meta.title: Spring Valley Collagen 1,000mg Per Tablet, Plus Vitamin C, Type 1 & 3, 120ct by Equate
